Summary Note:
The RM was introduced to Lang Koller Egger at a corporate retreat in Vienna. They participated in team-building activities and developed a strong rapport, which eventually led to a successful business partnership.
Lang Koller Egger is a 31 year old Clinical Trials Manager from Austria.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Lang Koller Egger is currently single. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
Lang completed his secondary education at Musisches Gymnasium Wien in 2012.
Lang completed his university studies at Modul University Vienna in 2018.
Occupation History:
Lang Koller Egger is a 31 year old Clinical Trials Manager from Austria.
At Novartis Austria GmbH, Lang Koller Egger held the position of Research Scientist from 2018 to 2023, developing essential skills in the field.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Clinical Trials Manager at Baxter BioScience in 2023, further expanding his skill set.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 50000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Linz, Steinbach am Attersee and Dornbirn, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
He inherited a significant sum of 370000 EUR from his grandfather, a respected Tech Entrepreneur, in 2017, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: In conclusion, we are confident in the client's financial stability and future prospects.
